question.long: Does playing video games lead to violent behavior?

description: Results from studies evaluating the impact of video games on violent behavior.

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the effects of video games on violent behavior

no.description: The literature suggests that video games do not cause violent behavior

towards_no.description: The literature suggests that video games probably don't cause violent behavior, but more research is needed

towards_yes.description: The literature suggests that video games may cause violent behavior, but more research is needed

yes.description: The literature suggests that video games cause violent behavior

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of the video games evaluated on violent behavior

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of the video games evaluated on violent behavior, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_but_mixed_results.description: The results of the paper show no significant overall effect of the video games evaluated on violent behavior, but there are mixed results in specific contexts

not_more_than_other_games.description: The results of the paper show that the video games evaluated do not cause more violent behavior than other types of games (board games, sports, ...)

maybe.description: The results of the paper suggest that the video games evaluated might have an effect on violent behavior, but the evidence is not strong enough to conclude

yes_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that the video games evaluated may cause violent behavior, but the evidence is not strong

yes_but_small_effect.description: The results of the paper suggest that the video games evaluated may have a small effect on violent behavior

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that the video games evaluated may cause violent behavior, unlike what is reported in the literature

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that the video games evaluated cause violent behavior
